name: BlackWhite (the ed)
description:
Black White.

You'r gole is to escape the game , caus the developer sucks.

Please just escape do what ever you want just ESCAPE!

The white blocks are solid blocks (you can walk on them) , but the black blocks are not

basicly the white blocks are ON , and the black blocks are OFF.

A relaxing 2d platformer , with a crazy difficulty curve

Hope you Enjoy :D
